app_name: XS Launcher Prime | Stylish OS Theme Phone XS Max
app_detail:
Inspired by OS 12, XS Launcher Prime is NOW coming! 

XS Launcher Prime is the most beautiful launcher available for your android device. Itâ€™s a OS 11 style launcher which provide you the latest phone XS launcher Prime experience: simple, elegant, modern, yet powerful!

XS launcher Prime brings the best features of retinal Launcher and Android Pie to your device, then adds a wealth of colorful, customized and unique features so you can quickly and easily make your home screen shine! It is everything you love about the launcher, taken to the extreme.

Standout features include:
ğŸ¯The best OS 12 control center
Make your phone look the same as an Phone XS! Within XS Launcher Prime, there is a OS 11 control center which will always running! When you in the game or open other app, you can always set up the control panel to set your music player, WIFI, Bluetooth, brightness, volume, camera, flashlight and so on. Strong compliant performance will benefit you! So easy to organize your screens alive.

âœ¨Personalize HD Wallpapers & Themes & Live Elements all in XS Launcher Prime!
Come and make your own fashion phone in a new way! Super cool wallpapers and awesome themes in XS Launcher Prime, customize home screen with unique launcher theme wallpaper. 

- Wallpapers: Thousands of well-selected live wallpapers, 3D wallpapers, and home-screen theme wallpapers in many categories.

- Themes: Selected stylish themes for Android users for free which were designed by our designers. In the build-in wallpaper widget includes categories such as nature, cars, animals, sports, lifestyle, food&beverage, game, abstract and more are available with regular updates. 

- Fantastic cool 3D switching effects and live wallpaper 
Only press the blank area on the desktop, can you find magical effects. We have many fantastic cool 3D switching effects. Choose one of your favorite to experience it.

ğŸš«No Ads:We remove annoyed ads, there will no accidental disturbances, and you can immerse yourself in the outstanding features of XS Launcher Prime.

ğŸŒ…Local Weather and Forecast
Know the weather of your city conveniently. The weather of this week and next week is displayed on the desktop. You can see the weather information you need inadvertently. Of course you can switch the city and widget position, it is very convenience!

ğŸ’«Manage Home Screen: 
- Icon badges: For the unread message, the lovely icon badges will show numbers of unanswered phone calls, unread messages for all apps. Turn on the icon badges tips in the settings, you can open your Facebook, Twitter and other social software notification, none of this information will be missed! You can get an excellent experience in the notification system of XS Launcher Prime.
- Screen Manager & Smart Folder: Easy to organize home screen
- Widgets: Easily enter into system and launcher tools

ğŸ” Hide Apps
Hide important apps from home screen. Itâ€™s a very sophisticated approach to open and hide your apps. Only two fingers can enlarge gestures to open this features. In addition, your can set your own password as the access key. We can assure that your app is hidden in here safely!

ğŸš€ Quikbar: frequently accessed APPs
Your frequently accessed App can be found quickly. You can open all apps through the drop-down, which will show your recently used apps, or you can customize the search bar with shortcuts and apps of your choosing.

Dynamic effects for 3D touch, Junk Cleaner and more useful tools can be seen in the near future! Stay tuned! 

If your like XS launcher Prime, please rate it on Google Play. Your feedback are highly appreciate and we will continue to devote out best efforts to offer more excellent functions and themes for you! Thank you!
